text: "Ballerina" is a song by Swedish singer Malou Prytz. The song was performed for the first time in Melodifestivalen 2020, where it made it to the second chance round. The song was written by Jimmy Jansson, Peter Boström and Thomas G:son, while being produced by Boström alone. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2020) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Sweden (Sverigetopplistan) | 40 |} ==References== Category:2020 singles Category:English-language Swedish songs Category:Melodifestivalen songs of 2020 Category:Swedish pop songs Category:Songs written by Jimmy Jansson Category:Songs written by Peter Boström Category:Songs written by Thomas G:son
title: Ballerina (Malou Prytz song)
